summary: This document is a series of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 26-27, 2019. It records inmate counts, housing unit assignments, and scheduled movements (e.g., for visits or attorney meetings) within the facility. The most significant entry is the scheduling of Jeffrey Epstein for an attorney meeting on July 27, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is documented as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 27, 2019.
Epstein was scheduled for an attorney meeting (ATTY) on July 27, 2019, per an inmate roster.
The documents show standard prison administrative procedures, including population counts, out-counts for inmate movements, and roster assignments.
The total inmate population recorded on these dates was 767.
Other inmates mentioned include Tisdale and Davila, the latter noted with a hospital (HOSP) assignment.
